message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This product holds significant value to me due to its unique features and high-quality materials used. Considering its worth to me, I am offering it to you for $120. I believe this price reflects the value you would receive while also ensuring a fair return for my investment. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
